## docker.ServiceContainerSetProps interface

Props for [docker.ServiceContainerSet](./cloud.docker.servicecontainerset.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ServiceContainerSetProps extends ServiceProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [containerProps](./cloud.docker.servicecontainersetprops.containerprops.md) | <code>Partial&lt;DockerContainerProps&gt;</code> | Props to apply to all [docker.DockerContainer](./cloud.docker.dockercontainer.md)<!-- -->s within this ServiceContainerSet. If a prop is specified in the source [Container](./cloud.container.md) component and in <code>containerProps</code>, <code>containerProps</code> will take precedence. |
|  [dockerHost](./cloud.docker.servicecontainersetprops.dockerhost.md) | <code>string</code> | If set, all children of this ServiceContainerSet that support the <code>dockerHost</code> prop will get this value, overriding any other value for this prop. |
